title: Balance Aromatherapy
description: Body care products using local ingredients and therapeutic essential oils made by hand in Ithaca New york
cleaned_text: Welcome to Balance Aromatherapy! All of our body products are made by hand in small batches using only pure ingredients, including jojoba oil, therapeutic-grade essential oils, herbs, and botanicals from our gardens and nearby farms. Our scents are carefully blended to help support you physically, mentally, and spiritually - because you should care as much about what you put on your body as what you put in it.
